tool_description: An API showing all the latest patch notes from the popular MMORPG World of Warcraft.
title: WoW Patch Notes Live

api_list.name: Get All WoW Patch Notes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the most recent patch note news from Blizzard's World of Warcraft news site.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wow-patch-notes-live.p.rapidapi.com/patch-notes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wow-patch-notes-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
